parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Skips all loop iterations and immediately returns the given value.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[breakWith]] return

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> return: [[Anything]] - Value to be returned when iterations are skipped

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> This loop will stop once <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_i</value></part></template> reaches 5; the output will be "0", "1", "2", "3", "4" and finally "END".
<code>[[systemChat]] [[call]] {
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] 10 [[do]] {
		[[if]] (_i == 5) [[then]] { [[breakWith]] "END"; };
		[[systemChat]] [[str]] _i;
	};
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[continueWith]] [[break]] [[continue]] [[breakOut]]
</value></part></template></root>
